thread.title: mike cribdon
thread.title_full: North West Motorcycles Direct reviewed by mike cribdon

author: mike cribdon
title: mike cribdon
text: I have never ordered something online that's been delivered in less than 24 hours. This was! Excellent customer service. I would not hesitate to recommend this company. I got emails regularly throughout the transaction and the luggage rack was packed securely. The rack itself is well made and good quality. Only slight issue is that you have to loosen the side fairings and gently pull them apart to drop the rack onto the bolt holes. But it's no big deal. Just undo the 2 bolts and GENTLY prise apart the plastic fairings half an inch or so. The rack then drops nicely onto the grab handles bolt holes. Job done in 10 minutes.
